name: Google Blogger
description: Publish documents to your Google Blogger blog
extendedDescription:
Publish Content Directly to Your Google Blogger Blog

Google Blogger is a free blogging platform that allows you to create and publish blog posts and pages. With millions of users worldwide, Blogger provides a simple and reliable way to share your content online.

By integrating Blogger with Lydie, you can publish your documents directly to your Blogger blog as posts or pages. This enables features like instant publishing, automatic formatting, content synchronization, and seamless integration with your Blogger theme.

## Instructions

### Connecting Blogger

1. Click "Connect Blogger" to start the OAuth flow
2. Sign in with your Google account that has access to Blogger
3. Grant Lydie permission to access your Blogger account
4. Select the blog you want to publish to
5. Choose whether to publish as Posts or Pages
6. Start publishing your documents to Blogger

### Getting Started

1. Create or edit a document in Lydie
2. Connect it to your Blogger integration
3. Choose to publish as a Post or Page
4. Select the target blog (if you have multiple blogs)
5. Publish and your content will appear on your Blogger blog

### Features

- **Direct Publishing**: Publish documents directly to your Blogger blog
- **Multi-Blog Support**: Publish to any blog in your Blogger account
- **Post & Page Support**: Create and update both blog posts and pages
- **Auto-formatting**: Content is automatically converted to HTML
- **Update Support**: Automatically updates existing content when republished
- **Pull Support**: Import existing posts and pages from your Blogger blog
